{"id":1113180649,"question_id":3,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1701810500,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1113180649/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"8.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        int n = int(s.length()), res = 0;\n        unordered_map<char, int> mp;\n\n        for (int j=0, i=0; j<n; j++) {\n            if(mp[s[j]]>0) {\n                i = max(mp[s[j]], i);\n            }\n            res = max(res, j-i+1);\n            mp[s[j]] = j+1;\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
